definition: a venture undertaken without regard to possible loss or injury, take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome
details:
noun
- a venture undertaken without regard to possible loss or injury
= example: a venture undertaken without regard to possible loss or injury
= synonyms: peril, danger
- the probability of being exposed to an infectious agent
= synonyms: risk of exposure
- the probability of becoming infected given that exposure to an infectious agent has occurred
= synonyms: risk of infection
- a source of danger
= synonyms: peril, hazard, jeopardy, endangerment
verb
- take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome
= synonyms: adventure
- expose to a chance of loss or damage
= example: expose to a chance of loss or damage
= synonyms: put on the line, lay on the line
